			[1661] tabpanel 'Details'
				[1673] heading 'Product Quick Look'
				[1676] list ''
					[1677] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText 'Celestron Hummingbird 9-27x56mm ED Micro Spotting Scope - Birder Friendly - Close Focus DistanceThe name Hummingbird reflects many of the qualities of hummingbirds: very small size, highly mobile (they can fly in most any direction at will), and capable of long-distance travel (many migrate between South and North America). The Celestron Hummingbird is a “micro” ED spotting scope, and like its namesake, the Hummingbird Micro Spotting Scope is as well suited to long-distance travel as it is to the backyard. Ideally suited for travel – the Hummingbird will easily fit into a pocket, shoulder bag, or carry-on luggage. This spotting scope is perfect for traveling birders as a more travel-friendly alternative to a full-size spotting scope. The lowest magnification level can also serve as a substitute for a binocular. ED Objective Lenses Extra-Low Dispersion (ED) glass virtually eliminates chromatic aberration, also known as color fringing, a visual defect common in binoculars. Hummingbird ED delivers edge-to-edge sharpness with excellent color correction and razor-sharp images. Not all ED glass is created equal. Celestron’s high quality ED glass delivers visibly brighter, sharper images compared to non-ED binoculars. The difference is especially apparent in low light conditions, such as at dawn or dusk. The Waterproof / Nitrogen filled construction of the Hummingbird keep it protected against wet weather, humid conditions, and other environmental challenges. The durable armor works to keep the Hummingbird protected against bumps and jolts both during transport and in the field. The Hummingbird is tripod / monopod / window mount adaptable providing a variety of options for viewing. This spotting scope can easily be secured to a stable platform for comfortable long-duration or long-distance viewing.Celestron Hummingbird Fast Action Pan Tilt Head Tripod - Excellent Choice for a Spotting Scope, Binocular or Camera, Black (82051)The Hummingbird tripod is an excellent choice for those seeking a lightweight yet stable platform for a spotting scope, binocular or camera. With four leg sections, three leg angles and an adjustable center column, the tripod can be set in multiple configurations to get the exact height or stance needed for your terrain and conditions. Use the panning handle and tension knob to scan across the horizon in smooth motions and follow your subject as it moves. The Hummingbird is the perfect tripod for any outdoor excursion from bird watching to stargazing and everything in between. Quick-Release Mounting PlateAttach a wide range of optical and photographic equipment to your Hummingbird tripod in seconds with the quick-release mounting plate. This broad, square platform with protective padding is ideal for attaching binocular adapters, spotting scope mounting feet, camera gear, and more. The mounting plate can adjust forward or backward depending on your preference and to find the perfect weight balance point. To up your viewing game, the platform also tilts up to 90° with a lock knob to secure it in place at any angle. For peace of mind, the quick-release plate has a safety mechanism that prevents it from sliding completely out of the pan head without pushing the release button. Telescoping Center ColumnThe center column of the Hummingbird tripod can be extended to raise the tripod head when additional height is needed. To adjust the center column, twist the lock-knob and move the center column to the desired height. The maximum height when the tripod is fully extended is just under 69”. At the bottom of the center column, there is a ¼ - 20” mounting stud to attach a camera to achieve a unique angle when viewing or imaging. Adjustable Tripod Leg AnglesEach leg of the Hummingbird tripod can be set at two different fixed angles as well as a fully extended position. Each leg has a leg angle adjustment latch, which is located at the top of the tripod leg, that allows you to lay the leg flat on a surface. There is a bubble leveler to ensure the tripod is level at any level and extension. Protective Carrying CaseTake your tripod anywhere in its soft woven case with comfortable shoulder strap. When not in use, the case is the perfect place to store your tripod.'

					[1685] listitem ''

						StaticText 'Product 1: “Birder-friendly” close focus distance: 10 ft. / 3m close focus satisfies birding field optic requirements'
					[1687] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText 'Product 2: A stable-yet-lightweight, versatile, and easy-to-use tripod perfect for just about any application'
					[1689] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText 'Product 2: Smoothly pan the horizon or tilt the viewing angle up and down with two directional adjustments—even flip your optic sideways'
					[1691] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText 'Product 2: Customize the configuration of your tripod to fit any viewing conditions: four leg sections and three leg angles allow the tripod to work with virtually any user or terrain'
					[1693] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText 'Product 2: Extendable center column provides even more height when needed'

step_data.action: stop('The Celestron Hummingbird 9-27x56mm ED Micro Spotting Scope features a magnification range of 9-27x, ED lens optical system for sharp images, and is compact and easily portable. It was first available on December 20, 2021.')
